name: Beaver Dash (itch)
description:
Welcome to hell!

We, a two man team of young game designers from Germany and Australia, are very proud to introduce you BeaverDash, an infinite runner, which takes the player deep down into
a world of zombie-pinetrees and brave beavers. Help these gnawers, to avoid as many traps and trees as possible before getting eaten, exploded or sucked out of angry bats.
